title: #375: Animal Communication with Katherine O'Shea and Lindsey Scharmyn
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back the Rogue Ways' Lindsey Scharmyn and Animal Communicator Katherine O'Shea to the show to discuss Katherine's animal communication abilities and her thoughts on what animals think and what they want from us. This is a super funny episode I hope you enjoy. Thank you so much for your support.

See Sam Tripoli Live:
Oct 3rd: The Mother Of All Truth Bombs live at the World Famous Comedy Store at 7pm pst. If you can't make it there watch it live-streamed at YouTube.com/SamTripoli

Cleveland: Oct 23rd: Hilarities 9:30pm show
